document.forum_title: SanTanValley.com - Your #1 Resource for Anything San Tan Valley! - SanTanValley.com
document.topic_text: View Comments With the remnants of Tropical Storm Javier bearing down on Southern Arizona, Pinal County Public Works wants residents to know if they need sandbags, many maintenance yards stand ready with sand and bags. In San Tan Valley, you can pick up sandbags at the San Tan Maintenance Yard located at 3535 E Hunt Hwy from 5am-3:30pm. Author: SanTanValley.com
